Entry.JapaneseText: フフンーフーン♪ フフフーン♪
Entry.EnglishText: Hm hm hm♪ Hm hm hm♪

Entry.JapaneseText: <Red>バトルブック<White>を書いているのか？
Entry.EnglishText: Are you writing in the <Red>Battle Book<White>?

Entry.JapaneseText: うん、だいぶ充実してきたヨ！
Entry.EnglishText: Yep, I'm filling it out pretty well!

Entry.JapaneseText: そうか……おまえのおかげで、 ずいぶん戦いも楽になった……
Entry.EnglishText: I see... Thanks to you, our battles have gotten much easier...

Entry.JapaneseText: 役にも立つし、思い出作りもできるし…… 一石二鳥だネ！
Entry.EnglishText: It comes in handy and it helps make memories... Talk about killing two birds with one stone!
